name: Crowd Control (Dragon Drop Games)
description:
What started off as a 40 hour game jam, quickly grew into something bigger. The first game released by the indie game studio "Dragon Drop Games". Play as a hardcore guitarist preparing for the best crowdsurf of his life, but be careful, rock conserts aren't the safest of places and many hazards may stop your ride!

Game Design - Paul Frame
Game Design / Pixel Art - Victor Weidar
Programming- Darryl Long
Graphic Design - Aline Otreus

"Royalty Free Music from Bensound"
